title: Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (April 2021)
author: whoishiring
story_text:
Share your information if you are looking for work. Please use this format:

  Location:
  Remote:
  Willing to relocate:
  Technologies:
  Résumé/CV:
  Email:
Readers: please only email these addresses to discuss work opportunities.
